about_the_game:
About This Game

Discover the Fantastic World of Sintonia!

Embark on a magical adventure as Maria, an unlikely heroine in search of her missing puppies. Explore a vibrant world filled with unique biomes and cunning enemies, where every step uncovers new challenges and secrets. Sintonia is a place where creativity and strategy come together in an unforgettable experience.

Introduction

A Journey of Unexpected Friendships and Epic Challenges

In The Sintonia Chronicles, you don’t just explore a vast world—you forge connections with the Guardian Oracles, powerful beings with unique personalities and a peculiar sense of humor. Every biome is a new discovery, and every boss is a puzzle waiting to be solved.

Core Mechanics:

Open-World Exploration

Explore the universe of Sintonia, inspired by classic 3D platformers, with interconnected areas and hidden secrets in every corner. Scale mountains, traverse dense forests, and dive into the depths of oceans while uncovering new biomes that will test your skills.

Advanced Physics for Dynamic Interactions

Push, carry, and break objects using the game’s enhanced physics. These elements are crucial for solving puzzles and unlocking new areas.

Strategic Puzzles and Boss Fights

Violence isn’t always the answer! Each boss requires you to understand their unique mechanics and use the environment to your advantage. Victory rewards intelligence and observation.

Parkour and Innovative Mobility

Jump, climb, and glide through Sintonia with smooth, precise movements. Use your parkour skills to navigate challenging areas and reach seemingly inaccessible locations.

Swimming and Diving

Don’t limit yourself to dry land! Explore rivers, lakes, and oceans, diving for hidden secrets and facing aquatic enemies that demand new strategies.

Intelligent and Challenging Enemies

Enemies in Sintonia aren’t just there to be defeated—they’re here to make your journey interesting! Each adversary has unique behaviors that can hinder or even help, depending on how you interact with them.

Deep and Engaging Lore

Mysteries of Sintonia

Uncover the world’s secrets through story fragments and encounters with the Guardian Oracles. Each one holds an important piece of the past, and it’s up to you to unravel the mystery of Sintonia.

Guardian Oracles with Unique Personalities

Meet the protectors of each biome—powerful beings with their own stories and attitudes. Some will be your allies, while others may test your courage and wit.

A World Born from Imagination

Diverse Biomes

From enchanted forests to scorching deserts and icy tundras, Sintonia is a world of contrasts. Each region brings new challenges, puzzles, and enemies adapted to their environments.

Playful and Enchanting Atmosphere

With visuals that seem to come straight from a child’s imagination, Sintonia combines vibrant colors and fantastic creatures to create a truly magical experience.

Ready to explore Sintonia?

Your adventure awaits. Build friendships, overcome challenges, and discover what makes The Sintonia Chronicles a unique journey in the world of 3D platformers!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.4 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard
  • VR Support: No
  • Additional Notes: Compatible with standard Xbox controller
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3.0 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2060 8gb or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard
  • VR Support: No
  • Additional Notes: Compatible with standard Xbox controller

short_description: Join Maria on an unforgettable journey through the world of Sintonia to rescue her beloved pups. Forge unlikely alliances, face epic bosses, and outsmart every challenge in a universe brimming with magic and adventure.

English*, Portuguese - Brazil*
